resources.string:
20181025 Alpha-v0.5
 Fixed Ethernet static ip issues
 Fixed USB Audio support
 Fixed Bluetooth HID support
 Fixed Gapps logspam
 Fixed Selinux denials(now you can set it to enforcing mode)
 Added A2DP AptX AptX-HD encoders
 Added Enable/Disable option for OGST TFT display to Odroid Utility.
 Added tvheadend, mplayer, ffmpeg
 Removed Safe headphone volume warning
